description: Ms. codex. Title from colophon on leaf 271a. Physical description: 27 lines per page; written in small naskh in black on glazed, laid European paper. Rubrication and catchwords. Some staining and a few repairs. Origin: 1194 H [1780] (leaf 271a). Incipit: الحمد لله ... کتاب الطهارة و ارکانه اربعة الاول فى المىاه
author: Ṭabāṭabāʼī, ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad, 1748-approximately 1816
abstract: Part of a commentary on al-Muḥaqqiq al-Ḥillī's al-Mukhtaṣar al-nāfiʻ, comprising Kitāb al-ṭahārah (leaves 1b-101a) through Kitāb al-ṣalāh (leaves 101a-271a).
extent: 274 leaves : paper ; 208 x 140 (143 x 83) mm bound to 210 x 148 mm
title: al-Mujallad al-awwal min Riyāḍ al-masāʼil fī taḥqīq al-aḥkām bi-al-dalāʼil.
uniform_title: رياض المسائل في تحقيق الاحكام بالدلائل. مجلد 1
creator: طباطبائي، علي بن محمد، 1748-approximately 1816
subject: Muḥaqqiq al-Ḥillī, Jaʻfar ibn al-Ḥasan, 1205 or 1206-1277—Mukhtaṣar al-nāfiʻ.
binding_note: Full black leather with blind-stamped central mandorla and pendants; orange paper doublures.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
